faq.title: We Answer Your Questions
faq.subtitle: The most common questions about our services and platform.
faq.sla_a: We guarantee 99.9% system availability with 24/7 monitoring and priority support for Business and Enterprise plans.
faq.security_q: How do you protect my data?
faq.security_a: We use AES-256 encryption, SSL certificates, continuous auditing and comply with Data Protection Law 1581.
faq.integration_q: Does it integrate with my ERP or TMS?
faq.integration_a: Yes, our REST API allows integration with any system. We offer SDKs for JavaScript and Python, plus real-time webhooks.
faq.support_q: What type of support do you offer?
faq.support_a: We offer support via email, chat, phone and WhatsApp. Higher plans include 24/7 support with guaranteed response under 15 minutes.
faq.compliance_q: Do you comply with Colombian regulations?
faq.compliance_a: Yes, we are registered with MinTIC, have National Police authorization and comply with RNDC, INVIMA and GDP standards.
faq.data_a: Data is stored on secure servers with cloud backup and configurable retention based on your plan.
faq.satellite_q: Does it work in areas without cellular coverage?
faq.satellite_a: Yes, our premium devices support satellite communication for rural areas and zones without 4G/LTE coverage.
faq.coldchain_q: Do you offer cold chain monitoring?
faq.coldchain_a: Yes, we have IoT temperature sensors, automatic alerts and INVIMA/GDP compliance reports for pharmaceuticals and perishables.
